benchmark_details.name: FreshStack
benchmark_details.overview: FreshStack is a holistic framework for constructing realistic information retrieval (IR) evaluation benchmarks by sourcing community-asked questions and answers. It generates challenging datasets aimed at improving retrieval systems and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the construction of challenging datasets for evaluating retrieval systems realistically.

data.source: Community-asked questions and answers sourced from Stack Overflow, along with code snippets and documents from GitHub repositories.
data.annotation: Nuggets are generated using GPT-4o on community-asked questions and answers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on retrieval and RAG performance on the constructed datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher α-nDCG@10 indicates better relevance and diversity in the retrieved documents.
methodology.baseline_results: Existing retrieval models show significant headroom for improvement in retrieval accuracy compared to oracle performance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data sourced from Stack Overflow and GitHub repositories, following their respective licenses.
